titleInfo.title: Head-thorax orientation of Bombus terrestris during learning flights

mods.abstract: Recordings of the head and thorax orientation during the learning flights of bumblebees, Bombus Terrestris. The gitlab contains the recordings and the analyses performed for the following publications: Doussot et al 2020 (Title to be added), Odenthal et al 2020 (Title to be added).
